text: Agailjhara Upazila is a part of Barisal district in Bangladesh. ==Population== According to the 2011 census, the total population of Agailjhara Upazila is 149,456. Of these, 72,421 are males and 77,035 are females. The total number of families is 32,839. ==Reference== Category:Barisal Division
title: Agailjhara Upazila
